description: Patch Plan for Improving Auto-Fix Outcome Observation

operations.content:
# Add logging for outcome observation failures
import logging
logging.basicConfig(level=logging.INFO)
def log_outcome_failure(experience_id, exp_hash):
    logging.info(f'Outcome fail for observe (auto_fix/low) x21. Last note: auto-log from master_verify pipeline - experience_id: {experience_id}, exp_hash: {exp_hash}')

# Call the function in relevant places
log_outcome_failure(8396, 'd78dde39eb167643a3e9c72bcf38be0d3c23c3da')
